app.title: JSON Tools - Comprehensive JSON Utilities
app.description: A comprehensive collection of JSON utilities for developers and data professionals. Format, validate, compare, convert, query, and visualize JSON data with these powerful online tools.

format.title: JSON Formatter & Beautifier
format.description: Format and beautify your JSON data with this easy-to-use tool. Improve readability with customizable indentation, validate JSON syntax, and quickly minify for production use. Upload from file or paste directly, then download or copy the formatted result.

compare.title: JSON Diff & Compare Tool
compare.description: Compare two JSON objects and visualize the differences. Perfect for API testing, debugging response variations, and tracking changes in JSON data structures. This tool provides a detailed list of additions, deletions, and modifications between JSON objects.

convert.title: JSON Converter - XML, CSV, YAML Conversion Tool
convert.description: Convert JSON data to and from different formats including YAML, XML, and CSV. This versatile tool offers customizable options for indentation, headers, and data formatting to meet your specific conversion needs. Perfect for data migration, API integrations, and format transformations.

visualize.title: JSON Visualization Tool
visualize.description: Visualize your JSON data with interactive charts. Transform complex data structures into insightful visual representations. Support for bar charts, line charts, pie charts, and more - perfect for data analysis and presentation.
visualize.selectFields: Please select X and Y fields
visualize.selectSeries: Please select at least one data series
visualize.noDataPoints: No valid data points to visualize

validate.title: JSON Schema Validator
validate.description: Validate your JSON data against JSON Schema to ensure data integrity and structure. This tool helps developers verify that JSON payloads conform to predefined schemas, catching errors and ensuring data quality before integration or API usage.
validate.enterBoth: Please enter both JSON data and schema
validate.jsonValid: JSON is valid according to the schema!
validate.jsonInvalid: JSON is invalid according to the schema
validate.templateDataLoaded: Schema template and matching example data loaded: {{name}}
validate.dataTemplateLoaded: Example data and matching schema template loaded: {{name}}
validate.schemaDescription: JSON Schema is a declarative language for validating JSON data. You can define the format, required fields, and data types, then validate whether JSON data meets these rules.

query.title: JSONPath Query Tool - Extract Data from JSON
query.description: Query and extract specific data from complex JSON structures using JSONPath expressions. This powerful tool allows you to navigate and filter JSON data with precise path syntax, ideal for API response analysis, data extraction, and JSON processing workflows.

guide.title: JSONPath Quick Guide
guide.try: Click on any example below to try it out
guide.child: Represents child elements, e.g., $.store.book accesses the book property under store
guide.array: Accesses the nth element of an array, e.g., $.store.book[0] accesses the first book
guide.allItems: Represents all elements in an array, e.g., $.store.book[*].title returns all book titles
guide.filter: Filters elements based on conditions, e.g., $.store.book[?(@.price<10)] returns books with price less than 10
guide.returnStore: Returns the store object and all its contents
guide.returnAllBooks: Returns all objects in the books array
guide.returnFirstBook: Returns all information about the first book
guide.returnAllTitles: Returns all book titles, e.g., ["Harry Potter",...]
guide.returnInStock: Returns all books where inStock is true

footer.description: A comprehensive suite of JSON utilities for developers and data professionals.
footer.built: Built with React, TypeScript, and Material-UI.
footer.privacy: All tools on this site are client-side only. Your data never leaves your browser.
